org.apache.flink.runtime.io.disk.iomanager

类 IOManagerAsync

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.disk.iomanager.IOManager
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.disk.iomanager.IOManagerAsync
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    public class IOManagerAsync
extends IOManager
implements java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
    A version of the IOManager that uses asynchronous I/O.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  IOManagerAsync.ReaderThread
      A worker thread for asynchronous reads.
      private static class  IOManagerAsync.WriterThread
      A worker thread that asynchronously writes the buffers to disk.

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.flink.runtime.io.disk.iomanager.IOManager

        IOManager.IOMode

      Flag to signify that the IOManager has been shut down already

      The reader threads used for asynchronous block oriented channel reading.

      Shutdown hook to make sure that the directories are removed on exit

      The writer threads used for asynchronous block oriented channel writing.

    • 方法详细资料

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Close method. Shuts down the reader and writer threads immediately, not waiting for their pending requests to be served. This method waits until the threads have actually ceased their operation.
        覆盖:
        shutdown 在类中 IOManager

      • isProperlyShutDown

        public boolean isProperlyShutDown()
        Utility method to check whether the IO manager has been properly shut down. The IO manager is considered to be properly shut down when it is closed and its threads have ceased operation.
        覆盖:
        isProperlyShutDown 在类中 IOManager
        返回:
        True, if the IO manager has properly shut down, false otherwise.

      • uncaughtException

        public void uncaughtException(java.lang.Thread t,
                              java.lang.Throwable e)
        指定者:
        uncaughtException 在接口中 java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

      • createBlockChannelWriter

        public BlockChannelWriter<MemorySegment> createBlockChannelWriter(FileIOChannel.ID channelID,
                                                                  java.util.concurrent.LinkedBlockingQueue<MemorySegment> returnQueue)
                                                           throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: IOManager
        Creates a block channel writer that writes to the given channel. The writer adds the written segment to the given queue (to allow for asynchronous implementations).
        指定者:
        createBlockChannelWriter 在类中 IOManager
        参数:
        channelID - The descriptor for the channel to write to.
        returnQueue - The queue to put the written buffers into.
        返回:
        A block channel writer that writes to the given channel.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the channel for the writer could not be opened.

      • createBlockChannelWriter

        public BlockChannelWriterWithCallback<MemorySegment> createBlockChannelWriter(FileIOChannel.ID channelID,
                                                                              RequestDoneCallback<MemorySegment> callback)
                                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        从类复制的说明: IOManager
        Creates a block channel writer that writes to the given channel. The writer calls the given callback after the I/O operation has been performed (successfully or unsuccessfully), to allow for asynchronous implementations.
        指定者:
        createBlockChannelWriter 在类中 IOManager
        参数:
        channelID - The descriptor for the channel to write to.
        callback - The callback to be called for
        返回:
        A block channel writer that writes to the given channel.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the channel for the writer could not be opened.

      • createBlockChannelReader

        public BlockChannelReader<MemorySegment> createBlockChannelReader(FileIOChannel.ID channelID,
                                                                  java.util.concurrent.LinkedBlockingQueue<MemorySegment> returnQueue)
                                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a block channel reader that reads blocks from the given channel. The reader reads asynchronously, such that a read request is accepted, carried out at some (close) point in time, and the full segment is pushed to the given queue.
        指定者:
        createBlockChannelReader 在类中 IOManager
        参数:
        channelID - The descriptor for the channel to write to.
        returnQueue - The queue to put the full buffers into.
        返回:
        A block channel reader that reads from the given channel.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the channel for the reader could not be opened.

      • createBulkBlockChannelReader

        public BulkBlockChannelReader createBulkBlockChannelReader(FileIOChannel.ID channelID,
                                                           java.util.List<MemorySegment> targetSegments,
                                                           int numBlocks)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a block channel reader that reads all blocks from the given channel directly in one bulk. The reader draws segments to read the blocks into from a supplied list, which must contain as many segments as the channel has blocks. After the reader is done, the list with the full segments can be obtained from the reader.

        If a channel is not to be read in one bulk, but in multiple smaller batches, a BlockChannelReader should be used.

        指定者:
        createBulkBlockChannelReader 在类中 IOManager
        参数:
        channelID - The descriptor for the channel to write to.
        targetSegments - The list to take the segments from into which to read the data.
        numBlocks - The number of blocks in the channel to read.
        返回:
        A block channel reader that reads from the given channel.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the channel for the reader could not be opened.
